name: Dialogues with Books
description: Dialogues with Books Join us for our book club meetup every third Sunday of the month. Bring along your favorite book, the book you are currently reading, or any book that had an impact on you. Share your experience reading the book with fellow bibliophiles and participate in winding and fun discussions around the joy of reading. Do all this while sipping on coffee/tea or having a hot tasty snack from our cafe! Your Host - Bharat is an avid reader with a penchant for classical literature and philosophy. He also dabbles in writing with a diverse portfolio of works across tech, philosophy, magical realism and fantasy. His reading diet includes a mix of fiction and non-fiction with his favorite novels being The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald, The Movable feast by Hemmingway and Crime and Punishment by Dostoevsky.Note: Rs.100 as cover is part of the ticket price.

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Dialogues Cafe Private Limited
organizer.description: Dialogues Cafe is a warm, homely space in Koramangala where natural light meets community vibes. Enjoy freshly made, minimalist cuisine while engaging in open mics, book clubs, and more. Whether you’re here to work, create, or connect, Dialogues Cafe is your space to belong.

name: Dialogues Poetry Open Mic
description: Lovers of poetry and prose — this one is for you!Whether you like listening, reading or performing poems or short stories, be ready to be entertained. We are on a journey to create safe spaces for the writers in town — to share their writing with like-minded people and become part of our community. You can hold us accountable for making you have a good time!Join us at Dialogues Cafe,Koramangala from 7:30 PM onwards, on every 3rd Sunday

name: Courtyard Picnic with Bunco. | January
description: About January PicnicJoin us under the canopy of our lush city oasis for a sun-soaked afternoon filled with board games, wine, coffee, and irresistible picnic platesPicnic Plates by Bunco BakeryMain menuConfit Chicken PieBrioche French Toast with Strawberry Compote and Whipped Ganache (V - Contains egg)Focaccia Caprese Sandwich (V)Focaccia Grilled Chicken Sandwich with Romesco, Sun-dried Tomatoes & Toasted AlmondsSpiced Guacamole and Soft Scrambled on Sourdough Toast with Chilli Oil (V - Contains egg)Pork Ragu on Sourdough ToastShrooms on Sourdough Toast (V)Savoury BerlinerPistachio Berliner (V - Contains egg)Bread ShowcaseClassic SourdoughMultigrain SourdoughJalapeno Cheddar Sourdough100% Whole Wheat SourdoughExperimental SourdoughJapanese Milk Bread (Shokupan)Brioche Loaf Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Bringing outside food into the yard area is not permitted.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: Movie Banter and Brews
description: Movie Buffs and Binge Watchers Unite!Join us for a fun banter where we talk about our favourite movies, must-watches and shows that you just cannot miss.Exchange movie and show recommendations while you connect with people. Talk about stories from movies that made you happy, excited or that which inspired you.You might just end up having a watch-party gang after this movie banter or take home a list of must-watch for yourself!

organizer.name: HighTable
organizer.description: Meet a small group of strangers offline, with no agendas—just good conversations and genuine connections. Whether it’s a random thought or a deep dive, you never know where it might lead. Sometimes, the best connections happen when you least expect them.

name: Movie Under the Stars | Film: High Fidelity
description: Join us for an open-air screening of High Fidelity (2000), with a three-course dinner by chef Rhea Aaron and popcorn.*Wines and other beverages will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieRob Gordon, a music-obsessed record store owner, reflects on his failed relationships and attempts to understand what went wrong. Through his top five breakups and a deep dive into his love life, Rob explores his past with his quirky employees, friends, and exes. The film blends humor, romance, and the love for music in a unique way, creating an introspective and relatable experience. It’s a story about self-discovery, nostalgia, and finding closure, all set to an unforgettable soundtrack.This cult classic's nostalgic and heartfelt story pairs perfectly with the relaxed vibe of an outdoor screening. Its mix of humor, romance, and a killer soundtrack will evoke shared memories and discussions among the audience. The movie's witty dialogue and emotional depth make it ideal for a cozy evening under the stars, where viewers can enjoy the music, laugh, and even reflect on their own relationships, making it a memorable and immersive experience.3-Course Dinner Menu by Chef Rhea AaronStartersWhipped Ricotta Crostini: Topped with balsamic-glazed zucchini and roasted red peppersMainsVeggie Cheesy Pasta Bake (V): Sundried tomato pesto pasta, baked to perfectionPesto Chicken & Broccoli Pasta Bake (NV): A creamy, hearty classicBoth served with warm, buttery garlic breadDessertWarm Italian Orange Cake: Paired with a luscious cinnamon Chantilly cream______Terms and ConditionsThe management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In the event of rain leading to a complete washout, Courtyard reserves the right to cancel the event. In such cases, a full refund for the ticket will be issued.

name: The Persian Spread
description: As our next pop-up, we bring to you The Persian Spread by Chef Nasrin KarimiExperience the warm and vibrant flavors of Persian cuisine as Tijouri hosts a special pop-up with Chef Nasrin. Known for her authentic and heartfelt cooking, Chef Nasrin brings the essence of traditional Persian dishes to life, offering a unique dining experience you won’t want to miss.MENU:Amuse bouche NOONO PANEER: vegetarian bite walnut feta cheese with oilve n tomato n lettuce Starters Vegetarian Hummus crunchy pitaMASTO BADEMJAN: Eggplant dip Non-VegetarianKOBIDEH KABAB: Mutton kababTORSH KABAB:  chicken kabab with pomegranate puree n walnutMains:Vegetarian Platter GHEIMEH - Chickpeas stew with dried Lemon n saffron served with orange peel rice. FESENJAN - a traditional stew made of pomegranate n walnut served with saffron riceNon - Vegetarian PlatterESHKENEH- gravy made of potatoes n fenugreek eaten with naanKHORESHT-E BADEMJAN - eggplant with mutton served with Naan or dill riceALOOBOKHARA - plum chickenMEIGOO - prawn in fresh cream n herbsDessertsTARHALVA -Persian custard with pure rose water n pistachios n saffron NOON NOKHODCHI - Chickpeas cookies with shiraz tea Terms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked.Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. In case you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: Apéro Dînatoire with Chef Arpitha
description: An Evening of French Plant-Based Fine Dining 🇫🇷✨Join us at the Studio by Copper + Cloves for an unforgettable culinary experience with our guest chef, Chef Arpitha., who has travelled from Lyon, France. Discover the art of French fine dining—completely plant-based and reimagined in the most exquisite way. The event is a rare opportunity to indulge in apéro dînatoire with a French tasting menu alongside cocktails. Apéro dînatoire is a French culinary tradition that combines the concepts of a cocktail/ aperitif (apéro) and a light dinner (dînatoire). It’s essentially a relaxed, yet elegant gathering where guests enjoy a variety of small, bite-sized dishes and drinks. Think of it as a sophisticated blend of a cocktail party and a tapas-style meal, where the focus is on flavorful, creative, and beautifully presented finger foods that are filling enough to replace a full dinner.We'll be serving C+C's signature zero-proof cocktails alongside Chef Arpitha's bite-sized food: here’s a sneak peek of the menu:	•	Tartare	•	Risotto	•	Panisse	•	Gâteau Provençale	•	Blinis	•	Terrine	•	Moelleux aux Amandes	•	Riz au Lait	•	Pain PerduSpaces are limited for this intimate 'cocktail party' experience, so book your spot now and treat yourself to an evening of flavour, creativity, and elegance.This is a great place to meet new people! The dishes in an apéro dînatoire are designed to be enjoyed while mingling, creating a convivial and intimate dining experience. It’s all about savoring the food, the drinks, and the company without the formality of a sit-down meal. Arpitha is a chef based in Lyon, France, currently serving as Head Chef at Like an Elephant, a vegan fine dining restaurant.Growing up in a traditional vegetarian family, she was immersed in Ayurveda, one of the world’s oldest sciences, known for its holistic approach to food and lifestyle. A lifelong animal lover, Arpitha has always been driven to create positive change. Embracing veganism gave her a clear vision: to inspire others to enjoy plant-based, delicious food. A passionate foodie, she dreamed of sharing recipes close to her heart. This dream led her to leave a corporate career in India, and dedicate her life to showing the world that incredible meals can be created without animal-based ingredients. Her journey as a chef began in the gastronomy capital of the world, France. Arpitha has honed her craft working in esteemed restaurants across Lyon and the South of France, including the first Michelin-starred establishment to offer a 100% gluten-free and plant-based menu, renowned for its commitment to sustainability.Sustainability is a cornerstone of Arpitha’s culinary philosophy. Guided by her deep respect for nature, she exclusively uses natural, seasonal, and locally-sourced ingredients. Through her dishes, she tells a story rooted in her vibrant culinary heritage, offering diners not just a meal, but an immersive journey through rich, layered flavors.Her cuisine is deeply inspired by her grandmother’s recipes from the two countries she calls home: India and France.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

organizer.name: Copper + Cloves
organizer.description: We are all about nourishing food and creating spaces for connection!

name: Bangalore Puzzle Pals with Playful Pursuits
description: When was the last time you put a jigsaw puzzle together? Puzzles are for everyone! It doesn’t matter if you loved puzzles as a kid, enjoy them now, or want to pick up a new hobby; if you do them solo or with friends and family; whether you like to take your time or prefer to blitz them - Bangalore Puzzle Pals is for you.Join us to enjoy a relaxed off-screen evening in a social setting while you put together beautiful images, solve puzzles from new and exciting brands, and get a little competitive with some speed puzzling or puzzle chess! You’re also welcome to bring your own puzzles either to solve or sell/swap with others.Come alone, with a partner, with friends or family! We will have something for everyone. (Under-18s may attend if accompanied by an adult.)Who is Playful Pursuits?We are Bangalore’s first jigsaw puzzle meetup group, providing a space for puzzle enthusiasts to come together to solve jigsaws, swap and sell their puzzles, and compete in speed puzzling! We meet in-person every Monday and on the occasional weekend.You can follow us on Instagram at @playful.pursuits and join our WhatsApp group.
